comment: 距离TOT前，选择TAXI时的进入座舱时间（分钟）
AB A/C despawn in Campaign -> delay before disappearing
AB A/C spawn in Campaign -> lead time before taxiing
AB A/C despawn in Tactical Engagement -> delay before disappearing
AB A/C spawn in Tactical Engagement -> lead time before taxiing
Improved method to allow servers to despawn stucked AI on airbases atomatically.
Determines what proportion of your squadron's roster will be available (in %).
Setting allows you to limit the effect of a low "percentage" setting (lower-limit of available aircraft).
Allows the MP host to specify a minimum client bandwidth setting (default 0 = no value forced).
Allows the MP host to specify whether AI pilots can be assigned for player controlled squadrons (default 0 = false).
If set, a client can save only the units of his team or allied, and the enemy spotted units (default 0 = false).
Time in ms between control surface updates, valid range 20-1000 (default 200), 0 = disabled.
If activated, dubious connections will automatically be forced to CS although they would work as P2P (default 0 = false).
If set, the network transfer rates set in the UI will be enforced - BMS usually does limiting based on "best effort" only (default 0/false).
Allows to tweak sky brightness at night.
Enables G training mechanism for human player (G warmup).
